Title: Authorizes the county of Tompkins to appropriate and contract for the development, maintenance, and management of affordable housing
Summary: Authorizes the county of Tompkins to appropriate and contract for the development, maintenance, and management of affordable housing.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to authorizing the county of Tompkins to appropriate and contract for the development, maintenance, and management of affordable housing
